## ⚠️ Pre-Merge Checklist (Copilot Agent)

Before submitting this PR:
- [ ] Your work matches the linked issue scope exactly
- [ ] You did NOT add unrelated changes or features
- [ ] All tests pass locally AND in CI
- [ ] No breaking changes without explicit approval
- [ ] PR description clearly explains WHAT and WHY
- [ ] No merge conflicts with `main`
- [ ] Build artifacts are not committed (only source code)

**If any checkbox above is unchecked, do NOT merge yet.**
